data.title: Francis Engle Obituary
authors: Stark Memorial Funeral Home and Cremation Services
data.meta_description: Obituary for Francis James Engle | SALEM - Francis James Engle, 75, passed away in Salem, on Friday, November 18, 2022, surrounded by his loving...
data.meta_site_name: Francis Engle Obituary | November 18, 2022 | Salem, OH
data.text:
SALEM - Francis James Engle, 75, passed away in Salem, on Friday, November 18, 2022, surrounded by his loving family. Frank was born in Salem, on May 08, 1947, to the late Jay Engle and Hannah Ragni Lehwald. He honorably served in the US Navy from 1964 to 1968, aboard the USS Truckee and was awarded the National Defense Service Medal. He cooked along side his brother, Dan Engle, at BB Rooners. Frank loved spending time with family and friends, spoiling the grandkids with donuts and sweets, watching Cleveland sports and old movies. His grandchildren will miss 'sundees' and 'sangwiches,' with their grandfather. Survivors include his loving wife Darla Engle of Salem, whom he married January 04, 1975; daughter Jami (Josh) Toot of Canfield; son Justin (Jeneen) Engle of Sharpsburg, GA; grandchildren Elijah, Cloe, Blake, Regan, and Cole; siblings Daniel (Margie) Engle of Salem and Delores Daft of Salem. Frank was preceded in death by his parents Hannah Ragni Lehwald and Jay Engle. In lieu of flowers, memorial contributions may be made in Frank's name to The American Heart Association.

A private, family memorial service will be held on Sunday, November 27, 2022 at Stark Memorial. Caring and professional arrangements have been entrusted to Stark Memorial Funeral Home and Cremation Services. To view Frank's obituary, send condolences and order flowers, visit www.starkmemorial.com.
